trans-unit.source: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et objekt som brukes til å tegne linjer og kurver.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: A Pen draws a line of specified width and style.
trans-unit.target: Penn tegner en linje i angitt bredde og stil.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property to draw several varieties of dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>til å tegne flere variasjoner av stiplede linjer.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The line drawn by a Pen can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
trans-unit.target: Linje av penn kan fylles på en rekke fyllstiler, inkludert fargene og teksturer.

trans-unit.source: The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object.
trans-unit.target: Fyllstilen avhenger av velgeren eller mønster som brukes som fyll-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A> property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws lines.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>bestemmer hvordan <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tegner linjer.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Linjer er tegnet som hvis de er fylt rektangler, med egenskapene for den angitte <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>for den nye <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>er satt til 1 (standard).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the fill properties of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer Fyll egenskaper for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified color.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> klassen med den angitte fargen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Color>er satt til fargen som er angitt av den `color` parameteren.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>egenskapen er satt til 1 (standard).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> -strukturen som angir fargen på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> og <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>er satt til fargen som er angitt i den `brush` parameteren den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdien angitt i den `width` parameteren og enhetene er satt til <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den `brush` parameteren angir også <xref:System.Drawing.Color>for <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: En `width` 0, fører det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tegning som om bredden er 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer egenskapene til dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på den nye <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> og <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Color>er satt til fargen som er angitt av den `color` parameteren.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdien angitt i den `width` parameteren.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: En `width` 0, fører det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tegning som om bredden er 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> -strukturen som angir fargen på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir bredden på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws closed curves and polygons.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer hvordan <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tegner lukket kurver og polygoner.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values—<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>—will change the appearance of a drawn line.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>opplisting angir fem verdier; imidlertid bare to verdier,<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> og <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, endres utseendet til en tegnet linje.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>Angir at bredden av den er midtstilt på oversikt over kurve eller polygon er standardverdien for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>for denne egenskapen angir at bredden av den er i oversikt over kurve eller polygon.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: The other three values, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, will result in a pen that is centered.
trans-unit.target: Andre tre verdier, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, og <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, vil føre til en penn midtstilles.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> that has its alignment set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>som er satt til justeringen <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>fører til upålitelige resultater tegnede noen ganger i posisjon senket og noen ganger i midtstilt posisjon.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> dash caps.
trans-unit.target: Også en senket penn kan ikke brukes til å tegne sammensatte linjer og kan ikke tegne stiplede linjer med <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>bindestreker caps.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref> that represents the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref> som representerer justeringen for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke medlem av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Justering-egenskapen er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer attributter for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Assigning this property causes the pen to draw filled lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne denne egenskapen gjør pennen for å tegne fylt linjer og kurver.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Den overstyrer <xref:System.Drawing.Color>egenskapen for <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som bestemmer attributter for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Brush property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen velgeren er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that can be cast to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som kan brukes som en <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> -strukturen som representerer fargene for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Color property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Color-egenskap som er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise med verdier som angir en sammensatt penn.

trans-unit.source: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt penn tegner en sammensatt linje består av parallelle linjer og mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt linje består loddrette parallelle linjer og mellomrom med variere bredde.

trans-unit.source: The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i matrisen Angi startpunkt for hver komponent for sammensatte linje i forhold til den pennebredde.

trans-unit.source: The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: Den første verdien i matrisen angir der den første komponenten (en linje) starter som en del av avstanden langs bredden av den.

trans-unit.source: The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: Sekundverdien i matrisen angir starten av den neste komponenten (mellomrom) som en del av avstanden langs bredden av den.

trans-unit.source: The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends.
trans-unit.target: Den siste verdien i matrisen angir der den siste komponenten slutter.

trans-unit.source: Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Anta at du vil penn til å tegne to parallelle linjer der den første linjen er 20 prosent av den pennebredde, bredden på plassen som skiller to linjene er 50 prosent av den-s bredde og bredden på den andre linjen er 30 prosent av den pennebredde.

trans-unit.source: Start by creating a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> and an array of real numbers.
trans-unit.target: Start ved å opprette en <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>og en matrise av reelt tall.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property.
trans-unit.target: Angi sammensatte matrisen ved å sende matrisen med verdier 0,0, 0,2, 0,7 og 1.0 til denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi denne egenskapen hvis de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>har sin <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med reelt tall som angir sammensatte matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Elementer i matrisen må være i stigende rekkefølge, ikke er mindre enn 0 og ikke større enn 1.

trans-unit.source: The CompoundArray property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CompoundArray er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egendefinert forbokstav skal brukes på slutten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> som representerer forbokstaven brukes på slutten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomEndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CustomEndCap er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egendefinert forbokstav skal brukes under starten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> som representerer forbokstaven brukes på begynnelsen av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomStartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CustomStartCap er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stykkestilen som brukes på slutten av bindestreker som utgjør stiplede linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Sett denne egenskapen til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>Hvis de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>har sin <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning and end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref> verdier som representerer stykkestilen som brukes på starten og slutten av bindestreker som utgjør stiplede linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke medlem av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DashCap er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden fra begynnelsen av en linje i begynnelsen av en bindestreker mønsteret.

trans-unit.source: The distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden fra begynnelsen av en linje i begynnelsen av en bindestreker mønsteret.

trans-unit.source: The DashOffset property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DashOffset er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise av egendefinerte bindestreker og mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property for this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne en verdi enn `null` for denne egenskapen vil angi <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>egenskapen for denne <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Elementer i den `dashArray` matrise angi lengden på hver bindestreker og mellomrom i bindestreker mønsteret.

trans-unit.source: The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Det første elementet angir lengden på en bindestrek elementet andre angir lengden på plass, elementet tredje angir lengden på en bindestreker, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element må derfor være et positivt tall som ikke er null.

trans-unit.source: The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på hver bindestreker og mellomrom i bindestreker mønsteret er produktet av elementverdi i matrisen og bredden på <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med reelt tall som angir lengden loddrette bindestreker og mellomrom i stiplede linjer.

trans-unit.source: The DashPattern property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DashPattern er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for stiplede linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property, makes up lines drawn with this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>angir at en egendefinerte mønsteret bindestreker og mellomrom, som er definert av <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>egenskapen utgjør linjer som tegnes med <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> for denne egenskapen</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> and the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>verdien av det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>egenskapen `null`, pennen tegner hele linjer.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> that represents the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for stiplede linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashStyle property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DashStyle er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Kaller avhending tillater ressursene som brukes av dette <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>til tildeles på nytt til andre formål.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>ble bruker.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stykkestilen som brukes på slutten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> verdier som representerer stykkestilen som brukes på slutten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke medlem av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The EndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EndCap er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen join for the ends of to etterfølgende linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap.
trans-unit.target: En linje join er vanlige området som er utformet av to linjer der endene oppfyller eller overlapper.

trans-unit.source: There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes tre linje join stiler: spiss skråkant og runde av.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a line join style for a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en kobling linjestil for <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>objekter, at join-stil vil gjelde for alle tilkoblede linjene i <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>objekter tegnes med den pennen. Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser resultatene av eksemplet avskrådde linje sammenføyning.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: ![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens")
trans-unit.target: ![Penner](~/add/media/pens5.gif "penner")

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"></xref> that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"> </xref> som representerer join-stilen for the ends of to etterfølgende linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The LineJoin property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LineJoin er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir grensen på tykkelsen på sammenføyningen på et kjegleformede hjørne.

trans-unit.source: The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join.
trans-unit.target: Hvor hjørne er avstanden fra skjæringspunktet for linje veggene på innsiden av sammenføyningen til skjæringspunktet for linje veggene utenfor sammenføyningen.

trans-unit.source: The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small.
trans-unit.target: Hvor hjørne kan bestå av mer når vinkelen mellom to linjer er for liten.

trans-unit.source: The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width.
trans-unit.target: Hjørnegrensen er maksimalt tillatte forholdet mellom hjørnelengde strekbredde.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.0f.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 10.0f.

trans-unit.source: If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hjørnelengden på koblingen for skjæringspunktet overskrider grensen på sammenføyningen, deretter Avskrådd sammenføyningen Hvis du vil beholde den innenfor grensen på koblingen for skjæringspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: Grensen for tykkelsen på sammenføyningen på et kjegleformede hjørne.

trans-unit.source: The MiterLimit property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MiterLimit er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Multipliserer matrisen transformering for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> av den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn multiplikasjon matrisen som er angitt i den `matrix` parameter transformasjonen matrisen for Multiplikasjonsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> objektet du vil multiplisere transformasjonen matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Multipliserer matrisen transformering for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> av den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeration element (either prepend or append) specified by the `order` parameter to carry out the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>opplisting elementet (prepend eller tilføye) angitt av den `order` parameteren til å utføre Multiplikasjonsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> du vil multiplisere transformasjonen matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to perform the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen til å utføre Multiplikasjonsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter linjestilen tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> can draw solid lines, filled lines, or textured lines, depending on the style specified by a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>kan tegne hele linjer, fylt linjer eller struktur linjer, avhengig av stilen angitt av et medlem av den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType>opplisting.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"> </xref> opplisting som angir stilen på linjene tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resets the geometric transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to identity.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller matrisen geometrisk transformering for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> til identitet.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle.
trans-unit.target: Roterer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av den angitte vinkelen.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn rotasjon på transformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Fordi form av en sirkulær, har ikke en rotasjon synlige fungere hvis pennen skaleres i x - eller y - aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen for rotasjonen for.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Roterer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av den angitte vinkelen i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Fordi form av en sirkulær, har ikke en rotasjon synlige fungere hvis pennen skaleres i x - eller y - aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen for rotasjonen for.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> som angir om du vil legge til eller prepend rotasjon matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors.
trans-unit.target: Skalaer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av de angitte faktorene.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn skalering matrisen til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som skalere transformeringen i retningen x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som skalere transformeringen i retningen y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Skalaer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av de angitte faktorene i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som skalere transformeringen i retningen x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som skalere transformeringen i retningen y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> som angir om du vil legge til eller prepend skalering matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values that determine the style of cap used to end lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdiene som avgjør stilen for forbokstav brukes til å Avslutt linjer tegnes av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> som representerer stykkestilen som skal brukes under starten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> som representerer stykkestilen som skal brukes på slutten av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning or end of dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> som representerer stykkestilen som skal brukes under starten eller slutten av stiplede linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stykkestilen som brukes på begynnelsen av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> verdier som representerer stykkestilen som brukes på begynnelsen av linjer tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke medlem av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The StartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StartCap er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kopi av geometrisk transformeringen for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en elliptisk form for pennespissen.

trans-unit.source: This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Denne ellipsen hentes fra standard sirkelfiguren ved å bruke transformasjonen matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at oversettelsen av matrisen ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen returnert av transformeringen egenskapen er en kopi av den pennen geometrisk transformering og, og må du fjerne matrisen når du trenger det ikke lenger.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av det <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> som representerer geometrisk transformeringen for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen transformeringen er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Oversetter lokale geometrisk transformeringen av de angitte dimensjonene.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the translation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn oversettelsen til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i y.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Oversetter lokale geometrisk transformeringen av de angitte dimensjonene i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i y.

trans-unit.source: The order (prepend or append) in which to apply the translation.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen (prepend eller tilføye) som skal brukes oversettelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, in units of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, i antall enheter av <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet brukes til tegning.

trans-unit.source: You can access the unit of measure of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object using its <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til enheten av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The unit of measure is typically pixels.
trans-unit.target: Enheten er vanligvis piksler.

trans-unit.source: A Width of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the Width were 1.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på 0, fører det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tegning som om bredden er 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Width property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Bredde-egenskapen er angitt for en uforanderlig <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, for eksempel de som er returnert av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> klasse.
